Title: Lunar Phase Silverlight Gadget
Description: Meet the moon phase, percent of illumination and corresponding zodiac sign from your desktop.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Meet the moon phase, percent of illumination and corresponding zodiac sign from your desktop.



Lunar Phase Gadget is a Windows gadget for sidebar.

It's developed in Silverght 3 with VS2010 RC.

Full tested.

Completely MVVM implementation.

Multilanguage, auto location detection, support spanish, english, italian, chinese, french and Portuguese, default english

By default Silverlight gadget don't work with Windows 64 bits. You have to close your current sidebar and then run sidebar.exe (32bit) from C:\program files (x86)\Windows sidebar.
